testsuite.name: tests.SD4_Remove_Product_From_Cart

testcase.name: test_SD4_Remove_Product_From_Cart
testcase.system-out: 1. Complete a successful login Navigated to https://www.saucedemo.com/ Element clicked Successfully Signed In with the STANDARD account 2. Add saucelabs backpack to cart Element clicked Sauce Labs backpack added to cart. 3. Click 'Remove' button Element clicked Sauce Labs backpack product removed. 4. Verify button changed to 'Add to cart' Element visible Element displayed Sauce Labs backpack add to cart button displayed. 5. Verify Shoppin cart badge changed to '0' Element visible No Elements in Cart Badge
